content:
I was super thorough with my investigation!
Just finished measuring the southeastern coastline...
I mean, those seagulls were so rude!

wooden castles,
model cars and tracks...

content: You know what Mobai found when checking the fish? The reason it couldn't swim was... {短暂停}it ate too much!

content: Seeing you help Frostia set up the tent reminds me of my childhood life with my sister.

content: I caught a fish that seemed too weak to swim and wanted to take it back to show Mobai, but a seagull tried to snatch it from me! I don't care, finders keepers!

Living together with everyone
feels really nice, mhm!
